name: Pickup Truck On Bumpy Offroad
description:
Driving a pick up truck on the off-road is a real task. Play this awesome game in which you will need to prove your very good driving skills.Drive your Pickup Truck to go around and finish challenging missions before running out of time. Playing through each of the levels of the game, you must keep away from crashing.
Features:
* Many Levels With Stunning 3 Dimensional Graphics
* Intelligent Missions To Give You A Tough Competition.
* Crazy Addictive Experience.
* Smooth And Easy Game Play
